headline: M&T Bank and Buffalo Bills Extend 'Official Bank' Partnership
summary: M&T Bank (NYSE:MTB) and the Buffalo Bills announced a multi-year, long-term extension during a special event they held today to celebrate the 40th anniversary of their first sponsorship agreement and the community impact they've made together in the years since. M&T will remain the "Official Bank of the Buffalo Bills" and become a founding partner for the Bills' new Highmark Stadium, set to open in 2026.
